name: Twinkle
description: Elegant and simple. Perfect for celebrations.
method: Add vodka and elderflower cordial to shaker, shake and double strain into coupette, top champagne and garnish

name: Somerset Sour
description: The sophisticated counterpoint to an Appletini.
ingredients: Apple Brandy (40ml), lemon juice (20ml), gomme (10ml), egg white (20ml), Cider (20ml top)
method: Add Somerset brandy, Cognac, lemon juice, gomme and egg white.Dry shake, add ice and strain into coupette, top with 25ml cider, garnish

name: Jack Rose
description: A fruity cocktail that still packs a punch. Popular in the 1920's
ingredients: Apple Brandy (45ml), Cognac (5ml), lemon juice (25ml), Grenadine (15ml)
method: Combine Somerset brandy, Cognac lemon juice and grenadine in shakershake hard and double strain into Sours glass

name: White Lady
description: Timeless drink in the sour family. A gin sour accented with orange from the triple sec.
ingredients: London Dry Gin (35ml), Triple Sec (15ml), Lemon juice (25ml), Egg white (25ml), Gomme (5ml)
method: Combine Gin, Triple sec, lemon juice, egg white and gomme in shaker, dry shake, shake hard with ice and strain into Sours glass and garnish

name: Corpse Reviver #2
description: A bright complex drink with a hint of anise.
ingredients: London Dry Gin (20ml), Triple Sec (20ml), Lillet blanc (20ml), Lemon juice (20ml), Absinthe (3 dashes)
method: Combine Gin, Lillet, Triple sec and lemon juice and Absinthe in shaker shake and double strain into Sours glass and garnish

name: Pendennis Club
ingredients: London Dry Gin (40ml), Apricot Liqueur (10ml), Lime juice (25ml), Gomme (10ml), Peychaud bitters (3 dashes)
method: Combine Gin, Abricot, lime juice gomme and Peychaud bitter in shaker, shake and double strain into Sours glass and garnish

name: Toreador
description: The next step once you've nailed your Margarita.
ingredients: Tequila (35ml), Apricot Liqueur (15ml), Lime juice (25ml), Gomme (5ml)
method: Combine Gin, Abricot, lime juice gomme and Peychaud bitter in shaker, shake and double strain into Sours glass and garnish

name: Scoff Law
description: A nice variation of a whiskey sour without egg whites.
ingredients: Bourbon (35ml), Dry Vermouth (15ml), Lemon juice (25ml), Grenadine (15ml)
method: Combine Bourbon, dry Vermouth, lemon juice and grenadine in shaker shake and double strain into Sours glass and garnish

name: Clover Club
description: A classic per-prohibition cocktail from Philadelphia. Complex and fruit with a rich silky mouthfeel.
ingredients: London Dry Gin (35ml), Dry Vermouth (15ml), Lemon juice (25ml), Egg White (25ml), Raspberry syrup (10ml), Gomme (5ml)
method: Combine Gin, vermouth, lemon juice raspberry syrup, gomme and egg white in shaker, dry shake and shake with ice, strain in Sours glass

name: Perfect Lady
description: A cocktail from the 1930's, riffing on the classic White Lady cocktail with a stone fruit twist.
ingredients: London Dry Gin (35ml), Peach Liqueur (15ml), Lemon juice (25ml), Egg white (25ml), Gomme (10ml)
method: Combine Gin, creme de Peche, lemon juice, egg white and gomme, dry shake shake with cubed ice and strain into Sours glass
